Experience the latest of Mi - from smart phones to smart devices, exclusively at Xiaomi Home
Experience the latest of Mi – from India’s best- selling smartphones to smart devices to a range of ever-growing list of accessories, firsthand.

Mi knowledgeable staff provides you with a comprehensive product consultation and helps you to buy a product which fits your needs. Whether it be product specification, operational guidance, or an unsettling urge to deep dive and understand the product even better, MI team will answer all of them, one by one.
"We currently support the following payment options at Xiaomi Home and are constantly working towards adding more options for a convenient shopping experience: 1.Credit Card 2.Debit Card 3.Cash."
